description: After updating to Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 118.0.2088.46, users may experience issues with navigation functionality. This may manifest as unresponsive pages or delays in page loads, affecting the overall browsing experience. This symptom is associated with CVE-2023-5484, which points to an inappropriate implementation in the navigation feature within Chromium. It is advisable to refer to KB-118.0.2088.46 for further details on the mitigated issues.
